form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Information about your residences and employment., NARA, 8/25/2023

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/25/2023 Part 4. Information about your residences and employment. A. List your addresses during the last five (5) years or since you became a permanent resident, whichever IS less Begin with your current address. If you need more space, continue on separate paper: Dates (month/day/year) Street Number and Name, City, State, Country, and Zip Code From To 3117 S. DIAMOND SANTA ANA, CA 92704 08-86 PRESENT B. List your employers during the last live (5) years. List your present or most recent employer first. If none, write "None". If you need more space, continue Meature on separate paper. 1102 Employer's Name Employer's Address Dates Employed (month/day/year) Occupation/position Street Name and Number - City, State and ZIP Code From To N/A SSI- Since 1975 recipient No Music Part 5. Information about your marital history. A. Total number of times you have been married 1 If you are now married, complete the following regarding your husband or wife. Family name Given name Middle initial NGUYEN VAN HUU Address N/A DECEASED Date of birth Country of birth Citizenship (month/day/year) Social A# (if applicable) Immigration status Security# (II not a U.S. citizen) Naturalization (If applicable) (month/day/year) Place (City. State) No this If you have ever previously been married or if your current spouse has been previously married, please provide the following on separate paper: Name of prior spouse, date of marriage, date marriage ended, how marriage ended and immigration status of prior spouse. Part 6. Information about your children. B. Total Number of Children 8 Complete the following information for each of your children If the child lives with you, state "with me" in the address column; otherwise give city/state/country of child's current residence. If deceased, write 'd√©ceased" III the address column. If you need more space, continue on separate paper.
